922eec65-18af-487b-a12c-ac389109a468.description: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Clinics for Internet of Things badge is earned through the completion of a 5-week virtual training on the basics of building and deploying Internet of things solutions on Microsoft Azure. The training also involves completion of a cloud skills challenge hosted through Microsoft learn and the submission of a concept paper describing how the individual would use the technologies learnt to build an impactful solution for their communities.
922eec65-18af-487b-a12c-ac389109a468.name: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Clinics for Internet of Things

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the cloud skills challenge with 12 modules that cover the introduction to internet of things, edge computing, and how to build IoT solution on Azure.

Submission of at least 3 concept projects that describe how they would use the learned technologies mainly: Azure IoT Hub, Azure IoT Central and or Azure IoT Edge to build an impactful solution for their communities.

fbadef2d-326d-4806-b1f3-32b354ac21da.description: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Participant badge is earned through completion of a 5-week virtual hackathon targeted for undergraduate students who are passionate about learning new technologies and solving problems. Placed in teams of five, those who have earned this badge have gained hands-on computer science practices and built impactful solutions for their community using an Azure hosted technology.
fbadef2d-326d-4806-b1f3-32b354ac21da.name: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Participant

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Participant badge is earned through completion of a 5-week virtual hackathon targeted for undergraduate students who are passionate about learning new technologies and solving problems. Placed in teams of five, those who have earned this badge have gained hands-on computer science practices and built impactful solutions for their community using an Azure hosted technology.

skills.name: Ability To Participate Professionally In Scrum Projects

f63ecb01-3514-49cb-9ff3-7b7a03e8a6de.description: Game of Learners Clinics for ML (Machine learning) and AI (Artificial intelligence) was a five-week Skilling initiative to level up in Artificial Intelligence on Azure. The main take away from the program is how to build and deploy end-to-end AI Solutions on Microsoft Azure. The sessions took place at 8pm EAT (East Africa Time) | 5pm GMT (Greenwich Mean Time) every Tuesday and Thursday between 5 July - 5 August.
f63ecb01-3514-49cb-9ff3-7b7a03e8a6de.name: Game of Learners Clinics for AI and ML

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a cloud skills challenge with18 modules covering getting started in Azure AI and ML including LUIS, Azure Bot Service, Anomaly Detector, Azure Machine Learning to build AI solutions on Azure

a8dbdbcd-b528-47e5-a24d-43d660ca4ebf.description: This badge is earned through the completion of an intensive 11-week virtual bootcamp which creates a hands-on learning experience for undergraduates and beginner developers to level up on their knowledge of .Net, JavaScript, Git, Azure, Software Design, and Program Management. Participants who have earned this badge built impactful solutions to challenges within their communities, leveraging the skills they acquired throughout the program.
a8dbdbcd-b528-47e5-a24d-43d660ca4ebf.name: Microsoft ADC West Game of Learners Clinics

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is earned through the completion of an intensive 11-week virtual bootcamp which creates a hands-on learning experience for undergraduates and beginner developers to level up on their knowledge of .Net, JavaScript, Git, Azure, Software Design, and Program Management. Participants who have earned this badge built impactful solutions to challenges within their communities, leveraging the skills they acquired throughout the program.

3b9429c5-b961-41ca-bc6f-7750dc29f664.description: The Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Peer Mentor badge is earned through involvement as a mentor in a 2-month peer mentorship program targeting developers (students and recent university graduates). Those who earned this badge demonstrated commitment in welcoming and guiding their mentees through technical upskill and connecting them to diverse Microsoft products and opportunities.
3b9429c5-b961-41ca-bc6f-7750dc29f664.name: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Peer Mentor

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Peer Mentor badge is earned through completion of a 2-month direct mentorship engagement with individuals preparing to be the Next Generation of Developers. Microsoft Student Ambassadors, who volunteered as mentors coached their mentees to greater opportunities and as a result, gained leadership skills and leant how to effectively collaborate to empower every developer in their community to achieve more.

c6f9c9d5-cb3a-4a2a-af8e-9c6bdd99574a.description: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Coach badge is earned through volunteering to guide a team during the Game of Learners competition and ensuring the team has the necessary resources that they need to perform well. Those who have earned this badge have volunteered their time, knowledge, and expertise to bring out the best in their team members throughout the 5 weeks virtual hackathon.
c6f9c9d5-cb3a-4a2a-af8e-9c6bdd99574a.name: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Team Coach

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Coach badge is earned through volunteering to guide a team during the Game of Learners competition and ensuring the team has the necessary resources that they need to perform well. Those who have earned this badge have volunteered their time, knowledge, and expertise to bring out the best in their team members throughout the 5 weeks virtual hackathon.

82948820-2129-4ec9-b93d-3e3e0e716071.description: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Winner badge is earned by being a member of the winning team at the Game of Learners competition, a 5-week virtual hackathon designed for undergraduate students who are passionate about learning and solving problems. Each team submits their final projects to be reviewed by judges and the winner is selected. The winning team is able to create a project that is customer-centric, has business value, has actionable next steps and demonstrates an inclusive experience.
82948820-2129-4ec9-b93d-3e3e0e716071.name: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Winner

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Participant

skills.name: Ability To Participate Professionally In Scrum Projects

5c267d04-9d2e-4896-90ed-751cb150473d.description: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Team Lead badge is earned through leading a team of 4 learners throughout the Game of Learners competition, ensuring that the team submits a complete project at the end of the of the 5-week virtual hackathon targeted for undergraduate students. Those who have earned this badge have gained leadership skills, problem solving skills, decision-making skills and effective communication skills which are required to successfully lead a team within a virtual environment.
5c267d04-9d2e-4896-90ed-751cb150473d.name: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Team Lead

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Microsoft ADC Game of Learners Participant

a5365674-8444-4603-8196-ff3e19bd7926.description: Congratulations on earning the Campus Lead Badge for the Microsoft ADC Students League program! It recognises your understanding of leadership & dedication to building a community of aspiring software engineers & product managers on your campus. As a Lead, it recognises your ability to demonstrate exceptional skills in fostering collaboration & empowering your peers to achieve their goals. Your help to inspire the next generation of tech leaders & we are proud to have you in our community.
a5365674-8444-4603-8196-ff3e19bd7926.name: MASL Campus Lead

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: Recognition of ability to lead with empathy, integrity and a passion for learning and development; championing the growth of others.

63c48487-575a-4193-829d-103dad8a7762.description: This badge is awarded to you for completing the Microsoft ADC 2-hour Learnathon & demonstrating your understanding of abstraction & subject matter knowledge while sharpening your problem-solving skills. As a Champ, you have proven your ability to analyse, & solve real-world challenges while gaining an improved understanding of software engineering principles. Congratulations on achieving this prestigious recognition of your dedication to skilling within our Developer Community Program Framework.
63c48487-575a-4193-829d-103dad8a7762.name: Microsoft ADC Learnathon Champ

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Africa Development Center

badge_template_activities.title: 1. Demonstrated knowledge and comprehension of fundamental concepts, techniques, and best practices in software engineering. 2. Proven ability to apply theoretical knowledge and skills to real-world problems in a practical, hands-on setting. 3. Showed the ability to identify and extract the essential characteristics of a real-life problem or situation.
